overview:
Romain is Director of E-commerce, Optimization & Analytics at Acceller.

Romain Rousseau graduated a leading French Business School in 2000 with a degree in International Marketing.

He worked at Club Med’s US headquarters for 6 years, in charge of e-commerce and online marketing for US & Canada.

In 2006, Romain founded HoopsVibe, a website gathering to his passion: basketball. The website rapidly grew a large audience and was acquired by [CraveOnline}(http://www.crunchbase.com/company/craveonline) in 2008.

Following the acquisition, Romain joined the company BrowserNation as Chief Operating Officer to oversee the development of branded browser applications. BrowserNation was acquired in January 2012 by BrandThunder.

milestones.description: Joins Acceller as Director, E-commerce, Optimization & Analytics
